item.title: Why Unoplat Code Confluence
item.description:
TL;DR We are building an open source code intelligence layer after seven years in corporate engineering. The core insight to start the venture was agents/humans waste ton of time rediscovering code and its metadata based on any task at hand. We want to build a precise structured information that keeps context tight and task specific.

The Itch

Seven years in corporate engineering gave me discipline and scale. I do my best work when I can own the stack, ship in tight loops, and see impact quickly. To align how I work with what I value, I set out to build open-source developer tooling.
